 These old ears are hearing a whisper voice, not sure if it's man or lady, =
saying "Steve, help me"

 



-----Original Message-----
From: urkel23@aol.=
com

hment]

ment(s) from urkel23@... included below]                          =C2=
=A0
 This seems to be the second most sought after recorder for evp's, so i=
  found one on ebay.=C2=A0 Much cheaper when the listing doesn't say EVP in=
 the  title.
 =C2=A0
 Got this one for a song !=C2=A0 I was just testing it=
 out and i thought i  heard something, let me know what you guys hear.
 =C2=
=A0
 Thanks,
 -Steve

<div>This s=

ys hear.</div>
